snippet: Hoping to benefit from the exposure, 10 comedians — nine men and just one woman — will face off in the final round on Sunday at the New York Comedy Festival.
abstract: Finalists of New York’s Funniest Stand-Up contest banter about competition’s upcoming last round, requiring 10 comics to craft fresh jokes for judges; contest, part of New York Comedy Festival, offers comedians chance to win $500 prize, audience of industry insiders and opportunity to perform in legendary club Carolines on Broadway.
lead_paragraph: Hoping to benefit from the exposure, 10 comedians — nine men and just one woman — will face off in the final round on Sunday at the New York Comedy Festival.

headline.main: New York’s Funniest Stand-Up Finalists Gear Up for a Serious Smackdown
headline.print_headline: 10 Comics, Still Standing, Gear Up for a Serious Smackdown
